author: Matsuo Basho
content:
An old silent pond
A frog jumps into the pond—
Splash! Silence again.

author: Yosa Buson
content:
Winter seclusion—
Listening, that evening, to
Rain in the mountain.

author: Kobayashi Issa
content:
A world of dew,
And within every dewdrop
A world of struggle.

author: Kobayashi Issa
content:
Even in Kyoto—
Hearing the cuckoo's cry—
I long for Kyoto.

author: Yosa Buson
content:
The light of a candle
Is transferred to another candle—
Spring twilight.

author: Matsuo Basho
content:
The first cold shower—
Even the monkey seems to want
A little coat of straw.

author: Kobayashi Issa
content:
Light of a firefly—
I give my love
To the next village.

author: Yosa Buson
content:
Autumn moonlight—
A worm digs silently
Into the chestnut.

author: Matsuo Basho
content:
Temple bells die out.
The fragrant blossoms remain.
A perfect evening!
